summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Memory Vault app - all core functionalities working. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend navigation and interactions working well. Minor UI layout issue identified in About page.

ui_bugs.issue: Echo panel not displaying in split-screen layout - only Vampire panel visible

passed_tests: Login error handling for invalid password
Navigation between all pages (Home, About, Gallery, Achievements, To-Dos, Tribute)
Gallery empty state and upload button
To-Dos confetti animation on task completion
Mobile responsive design and navigation menu
All backend API endpoints (23/23 tests passed)
CRUD operations for gallery, achievements, todos, tribute
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix About page layout - Echo panel not displaying in split-screen view. All other functionalities working correctly.
